name: Viachaslau Pratasenia
subtitle: I build things with Flutter and lead teams to create amazing products.
full_description: Leading the Flutter development team at AventusIT, I focus on making easy-to-use apps for Android, iOS, web, and desktop. My goal is to build applications that are straightforward and enjoyable for everyone, while mentoring and empowering our developers. By using Flutter, I work on creating innovative and accessible solutions that keep up with the latest technology trends, ensuring team excellence and project success.
about_me:
I am Viachaslau, a highly skilled Flutter developer and Mobile Team Lead with over 7 years of experience in the technology industry. My extensive knowledge and expertise in Flutter development, combined with team leadership capabilities, make me the perfect candidate for any project in this field. Currently, I lead a mobile development team, guiding and mentoring developers while ensuring project success and team growth.

My experience developing Android apps has greatly influenced my approach to projects on Flutter. I create functional and intuitive solutions that enhance the user experience, while fostering a collaborative development environment. I am passionate about solving complex problems and strive to create user-friendly designs. As a team leader, I focus on both technical excellence and team development. My goal is to create applications that deliver exceptional value while building and maintaining high-performing development teams.

Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:
contact_me_text: Although I’m not currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I’ll try my best to get back to you!

services.title: Mobile Applications
services.description: Building cross-platform mobile apps for Android and iOS using Flutter. From MVP to enterprise-level applications with clean architecture and modern design.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Creating responsive and performant web applications using Flutter for web. Single codebase for web, mobile, and desktop platforms.

services.title: CRM Systems
services.description: Developing custom CRM solutions tailored to your business needs. Integration with existing tools and automation of business processes.

services.title: E-commerce Solutions
services.description: Building complete e-commerce platforms with payment integration, inventory management, and user-friendly interfaces.

services.title: Desktop Applications
services.description: Creating desktop applications for Windows, macOS, and Linux with native performance and modern UI/UX.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: Designing beautiful and intuitive user interfaces with focus on user experience. Prototyping and creating design systems.

work.title: Flutter Developer/Mobile Team Lead
work.description:
As a Mobile Team Lead at an e-commerce project and Developer at 7VPN, I manage diverse responsibilities across different projects. At 7VPN, I play a key role in a three-person development team, working across iOS, macOS, Windows, and Web platforms.

In my leadership role, I conduct various team meetings including technical calls, one-on-ones, daily standups, and retrospectives. I'm responsible for team planning, maintaining documentation, and overseeing application optimization. These leadership responsibilities help ensure smooth project execution and team growth.

My technical contributions at 7VPN include creating the personal account website, integrating deep links, implementing notifications, deploying social login features, managing news functionality, creating build environments, and other features.

Tools: XCode, Android Studio, Figma, Firebase, Google Cloud Platforms.

work.title: Flutter Developer
work.description:
At Symfa, I served as a crucial contributor to both our dating app and corporate chat service, akin to Slack. My role provided me a dynamic experience, from integrating Redux to adopting null safety and migrating to updated Flutter versions.

Beyond coding, my responsibilities also covered the entire spectrum of app publishing. I communicated actively with Google Play and App Store teams to troubleshoot issues and bugs, ensuring a seamless user experience post-launch.

Tools: Xcode, Android Studio, Figma, Firebase.

work.title: Android/Flutter Developer
work.description:
At Heapix, I functioned as an Android/Flutter developer and was involved in a diverse range of projects, including food delivery apps and smart home control systems. My role extended beyond coding, as I initiated applications from the ground up.

In collaboration with development, design, and management teams, I honed my skills in customer communication and even gathered experience in project management.

Tools: Android Studio, Figma, Firebase, Adobe Illustrator.

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.description: This personal website created with Flutter and hosted on GitHub Pages. It's designed to be clean and user-friendly. You can view the source code on GitHub to see how it was built and maybe even contribute. This site demonstrates how versatile Flutter can be for web projects.

projects.title: Never Have I Ever
projects.description: Never Have I Ever is a mobile app that allows you to play the popular party game with your friends, more than 10 categories, 2000+ questions. The app was created using Flutter and is available on Google Play.

projects.title: Workout Tracker App Design
projects.description: This workout tracker app design, made in Figma, combines easy navigation with a sleek look to help users track their fitness journey effortlessly. The focus is on simplicity, making sure users can quickly log workouts and see their progress.

blog_posts.title: The Easiest Way to Use Environments in Flutter
blog_posts.description: In this article, we'll explore how to use environment variables in your projects without needing extra libraries. Environment variables help keep your settings secure and make your code easier to update.

blog_posts.title: Styling Flutter Apps Made Easy with Google Fonts
blog_posts.description: Learn how to quickly improve your Flutter apps look with Google Fonts. This article will show you how to pick and use different fonts easily, making your apps more stylish with little effort.

blog_posts.title: Flutter Version Management: A Comprehensive Guide
blog_posts.description: This guide covers Flutter Version Management (FVM), a tool for efficiently handling multiple Flutter SDKs. It simplifies SDK installation, version switching and project consistency.
